item.description:
Hi,
I would like to invite you up to the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club for our annual Holiday Celebration Weekend. We havethe following activities planned!

Guest fees = $20 per night per person
Friday night 9:00 PM - Reception with Beer Bar
Since our stocking contest was such a huge success last year, we've decided to do it again! So please bring a decorated stocking (naughty or nice!) and hang it on the dining room walls before dinner on Saturday


Saturday
Ski at Bretton Woods - $25 Lift tickets for guests

3-7pm - Private Yankee Swap - please be back at the house on time.

7-8pm - Group dinner catered by chef Shaun
Fried Honey Lemon Chicken Breast
Rice Pilaf
Steamed Glazed Carrots
Caesar Salad
Dinner Roll
Dessert-Undecided
Soup - Undecided
$25pp including Sat and Sun breakfast


9pm-1am - Night Event - $10

Yankee Swap Details
Gift swap is optional- But if you don't bring one, you don't get one.
Please place your wrapped gift under the tree before the event starts.


Gifts should be about $20.
Gifts can be naughty or nice.
Event is FREE, but it's BYO
If you have any questions, please contact me

Breakfast Menu
Similar to last visit by Chef Shaun
Possible Omelet Station
B'fast served 7:30-9:30 Sat & Sun

Cost for the weekend 2 nights guest fee ($40) plus meals ($25) and social event ($10) = $75

I need to know ASAP - so please RSVP by noon on Wednesday, December 10!

Directions given to Yes RSVPs

Regards,
Jonathan Magsino
item.how_to_find_us: Just come in - you'll find us!

group.name: Boston Ski, Snowboard, and Outdoor Adventurers Meetup Group

item.name: Christmas Party Weekend at Wedeln Ski and Outdoor Club
